I'm working with JavaScript, React, HTML5, and CSS to create apps that are easy-to-use and intuitive, allowing the world to focus on what THEY are most passionate about. What's your passion?

projects.title: Running Shoe Guide
projects.description: Built as a class project, The Running Shoe Guide helps users cut through all of the marketing noise and learn which style of running shoe best fits their specific needs. I was responsible for the JavaScript logic, implementing use of Karnaugh Maps to simplify the questionnaire and ensure accurate results.

projects.title: Horned Beasts
projects.description: Personal project crafted in an Intermediate coding course. App integrates React and Bootstrap libraries for interactive user experience including use of modals and .json files.
